extensionDescription.message: Lets you find RSS or Atom subscriptions in web pages easily

feed.openFeedLink.description: Text of button which opens feed in a new tab, directly or via 3rd party service

feed.copyLinkButton.description: Label for the button that copies the link feed.

feed.noFeedsAvailable.message: This tab has no RSS or ATOM feeds available
feed.noFeedsAvailable.description: This text is shown if there are no RSS or ATOM tabs

failed.fetchFeedsFailed.message: Failed to fetch feeds. Please check permissions.
failed.fetchFeedsFailed.description: Error message displayed when the application cannot retrieve the feed list

failed.fetchFeedsFailedReloadButton.description: Button text for reloading feeds after a failed fetch attempt

feed.onSuccessFeedLinkCopy.description: Successfully copied the link to the clipboard

feed.onFailedFeedLinkCopy.message: Failed to copy selected link. Check if Clipboard access is enabled in Firefox extension permissions
feed.onFailedFeedLinkCopy.description: Failed to copy the link to the clipboard

settings.title.description: The title of the settings dialog.

settings.closeButtonAriaLabel.description: The aria-label for the button that closes the settings dialog.

settings.themeSelectLabel.description: The label for the theme selection dropdown.

settings.themeOptionAuto.description: An option in the theme selection dropdown for automatic theme selection based on system preferences.

settings.themeOptionLight.description: An option in the theme selection dropdown for a light theme.

settings.themeOptionDark.description: An option in the theme selection dropdown for a dark theme.

settings.defaultOpenerLabel.description: A label describing select menu to choose default opener

settings.hintUnblock.message: Fill settings below to unblock disabled options.
settings.hintUnblock.description: A hint on how to unblock disabled options

settings.thirdPartyOpenersTitle.description: Title for section with 3rd party openers config

settings.thirdPartyOpenersHint.message: Configure alternative feed openers to handle specific feed types or keep empty if not needed.
settings.thirdPartyOpenersHint.description: Hint about the 3rd party openers section

settings.saveAndApplyButton.description: The text on the button to save and apply the selected settings.

settings.tinyTinyRssUrlLabel.description: The label for the input field to enter the URL for TinyTinyRSS.

settings.nextcloudUrlLabel.description: The label for the input field to enter the URL for Nextcloud News.

settings.freshRssUrlLabel.description: The label for the input field to enter the URL for FreshRSS.

settings.errorMessageInvalidUrl.description: An error message displayed when the user enters an invalid URL in any of the URL input fields.
